title: Stage Lv10-S38
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Are we really sure about going ahead like this?
One more time, is this really the best option?
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Are we really sure about going ahead like this?

sentences.kr: 마지막으로 한 번 더, 이게 최선이야?
sentences.en: One more time, is this really the best option?
Are you confident you won't regret this?

sentences.kr: 이제 돌이킬 수 없을 텐데, 괜찮아?
sentences.en: There'll be no turning back after this, is that okay?

sentences.kr: 정말 확실해? 다시 생각해볼 시간 필요 없어?
sentences.en: Are you absolutely certain? Don't you need time to reconsider?

sentences.kr: 모든 걸 고려해봤을 때, 이게 답이야?
sentences.en: Considering everything, is this the answer?
Can we consider this the final decision?
Can we conclude like this and proceed?
